body_html:
El Capitan has a protection feature built-in that prevents overwriting some
python dirs even with sudo

On Tue, Aug 9, 2016 at 8:55 PM, ashvsdata notifications@github.com wrote:

Do not use sudo pip on Mac. use pip install --user <package_name>

—

body:
El Capitan has a protection feature built-in that prevents overwriting some
python dirs even with sudo

On Tue, Aug 9, 2016 at 8:55 PM, ashvsdata notifications@github.com wrote:

> Do not use sudo pip on Mac. use pip install --user <package_name>
> 
> —
